BASE_FERTILITY.rationale: Fragile equilibrium baseline; makes productivity improvements matter without heavy randomness.

SPOILAGE_RATE_BASE.rationale: Baseline spoilage pressure; granary reduces to 0.02.

UNREST_SHORTAGE_PENALTY.rationale: Shortage should be painful and visible.

UNREST_ARREARS_PENALTY.rationale: Arrears penalty applies next turn only (WP-02 lock); keep pressure but avoid instant death spiral.

UNREST_BASELINE_DECAY_WHEN_STABLE.rationale: Provides mild relief when fed + current on dues (v0.0.4 target: median end unrest <= 40 under prudent play).

BUILD_RATE_PER_BUILDER_PER_TURN.rationale: Keeps multi-turn construction meaningful; builders vs farmers tradeoff is real.

SELL_CAP_FACTOR_RANGE.rationale: Maintains sell-cap variance without dynamic pricing.

BUILDER_FORWARD_FOOD_BUFFER_TURNS.rationale: WP-08 lock (policy-only): stall builders when stored food < 1.2 turns of consumption.

BUILDER_FORWARD_PROJECT_PICK.rationale: WP-09 lock (policy-only): cheapest viable improvement tie-break tuple.
